msqa.name: MSQA-100
msqa.subtitle: Portable CASA Semen Analyzer
msqa.description: Portable, home-use CASA system with smartphone compatibility, delivering laboratory-level performance in a compact format.

detail.description: The MSQA-100 is a portable, home-use Computer-Assisted Sperm Analysis (CASA) system designed for fast, accurate, and user-friendly semen evaluation. By combining microfluidic technology, precision manufacturing, and AI-driven image analysis, the MSQA-100 delivers laboratory-level performance in a compact and accessible format.

items.label: Microfluidic Slide:
items.text: The proprietary microfluidic slide creates a 7 μm fixed observation chamber when two layers are assembled. This fixed-depth design eliminates the need for manual focusing and ensures consistent, reproducible results.

items.label: Universal Smartphone & Tablet Compatibility:
items.text: Compatible with almost all mainstream smartphone and tablet rear cameras, enabling flexible and low-cost imaging without dedicated microscopes.

items.label: Built-in Temperature Control:
items.text: Integrated thermal module maintains samples at 37°C during analysis, preserving sperm motility and ensuring physiologically accurate results.

items.label: Ultra-Microfluidic Polymer Biochip:
items.text: Advanced microfluidic design for precise sample handling and optimal flow characteristics.

items.label: Cloud-Based AI Analysis:
items.text: Powered by a cloud server Gaussian dynamic image intelligent algorithm for accurate and automated data processing.

items.label: Automatic Focus Microscopic Vision System:
items.text: Ensures optimal image quality for analysis with automatic focusing capabilities.

items.label: Fully Automated Analysis:
items.text: Minimal user operation, suitable for both professional and home settings.

applications.title: Applications
items: Field testing and mobile health units

sqavet.name: SQA-6100vet
sqavet.subtitle: Fully Automated Veterinary CASA System
sqavet.description: Revolutionary fully automated CASA system for animal reproductive assessment, supporting multi-species analysis with portable field capabilities.

detail.description: SQA-6100vet represents the pinnacle of veterinary reproductive technology. This revolutionary fully automated CASA system delivers unmatched accuracy and reproducibility in animal sperm parameter evaluation, it can work as a standalone all-in-one system which has big advantages in on field and portable situation and can also work with the dedicated PC software for more user-friendly data management.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
items: Advanced Gaussian dynamic AI image algorithm
As fast as 15 seconds analysis time, selectable multiple fields of view

groups.title: Dosing
items: Auto calculate number of doses based on extender times, sample volume, sperm number, etc.

thermalIntegrity.title: The Thermal Integrity Advantage
thermalIntegrity.subtitle: Why built-in temperature control is essential for accurate CASA analysis
thermalIntegrity.intro: In the world of andrology, "Motility is Temperature." The SQA-6100vet features an internal, real-time heating stage that maintains samples at physiological temperatures (37°C) throughout analysis. This critical feature ensures that sperm motility is measured under life-like conditions, preventing false "Unsatisfactory" diagnoses caused by cold shock.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.text: Animal sperm are extremely sensitive to temperature changes. A drop of just 2-3°C can cause immediate motility loss, leading to inaccurate results.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.text: The SQA-6100vet's integrated heating stage maintains constant 37°C throughout analysis, revealing true progressive motility as it exists in the animal's reproductive tract.

scientificStandards.title: Scientific Standards Compliance
scientificStandards.description: The SQA-6100vet is designed to align with leading veterinary andrology standards and guidelines. Our system supports compliance with established protocols for breeding soundness examination across multiple species.

standards.title: Society for Theriogenology (SFT)
standards.text: Compliant with SFT guidelines for Bull, Ram, and Equine Breeding Soundness Examination (BSE/EBSE). Supports standardized evaluation protocols.

standards.title: Multi-Species Protocols
standards.text: Species-specific algorithms ensure accurate parameter evaluation.

standards.title: Field & Laboratory Use
standards.text: Portable design enables on-site BSE examinations while maintaining laboratory-grade precision. Ideal for seedstock producers and veterinary clinics.

standards.title: Research Validation
standards.text: Technology validated by peer-reviewed research and used in academic institutions worldwide for reproductive research and clinical practice.

scientificStandards.footer: Explore Veterinary Standards: Visit our Knowledge Hub for detailed guides on breeding soundness examination standards and best practices.
